price: 7. Nummah Nabii Yuusuf kee kay toobokoh xaagut Yallih duddaa kee kay inkittinaane tascassee astooti tan, ken xaagu esseraah woh yaaxigem faxa marah.
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
